attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I opened the app then oh my god my eyes couldn’t see it then I saw a big carrot I got so scared that I had night mares so I had to delete this gross app I hope no one downloading this trash

attributes.title: Very disappointing
attributes.review: This app made my brother fall into a deep coma. Also now my mom experiences abdominal diarrhea, please DONT download this horrid app. Bad things will happen to you like it did to my family.

attributes.title: Trump needs to stop ✋🏻
attributes.review: Trump needs to stop he is taking everything from us and most people here are from TikTok and he has banned it from India and the United States

attributes.title: are you kidding?!??
attributes.review: I was originally downloading this app as a joke, but I was given a virus AND had to wipe my phone completely! This is super unprofessional and I’m sick that this app is still on the store🙄🙄
This Cheeto puff🤡 is really getting on my last NERVE. 😡This app was tracking me and trying to stalk me. Really disrespectful!!🙄 He should just quit while he is at it, before something worst happens.

attributes.title: No thanks
attributes.review: Thought i could use this app to learn something, but alas this was a mistake, i would not recommend to others.

attributes.title: Worst app known to the human race
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in an attempt to understand the depth of stupidity of the president and it almost killed me. The stupidity was so strong it caused to me have a heart attack and go unconscious for many hours. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.

attributes.title: Don't vote for trump
attributes.review: In my honest opinion trump really isn't right for America. We need someone who respects all lives no matter we're they came from it there backstories.  Period

attributes.title: orange
attributes.review: i am so disgusted with this app. it has an orange everywhere and idk what’s going on. they say his name is trump but i’m still so confused. and apparently he’s our president!!! like who let an orange run our country. he’s so old that it wouldn’t surprise me if when he dies he’s just squishy. after these four years can we make a new white house that doesn’t smell like rotten oranges.
